### Data

```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
```

### Sexual dimorphism

```{r}
penguins %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x=flipper_length_mm, y=sex, color=sex)) +
  geom_boxplot(outlier.alpha = 0, alpha=0) +
  coord_flip() +
  facet_wrap(~species)
```
